location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of part of the undemarcated frontier between Afghanistan and Persia

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on tracing paperDimensions: 490 x 330 mmFoliation: the map has been foliated with a number written in pencil enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: Outline map showing part of the frontier between Husainabad in the north; Neh in the south; Sailabad in the west; and Duroh in the east.Distinctive features: only shows roads, a few place names and high ground.Scale not given.
